reviewText: The video was a hit with my son.

Most amazing Motocross Video for it's time!!  Would honestly put it up against any other video made up until today.  The "Scholars" of yesteryear, the "Music", the "Choreography" - too many things to compliment.  This is THE ultimate Motocross video made and upsets me to NOT be able find a decent copy of it.
Great experience buying.  I received a very hard to find video, for an unbeatable price, in great shape for a previously owned dvd.  I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Great job guys!!

WOW! What a video! The cinematography is fantastic and the music is just right for the video. I gave this to my 6-year-old son and he loves it! Nothing is scary but the movie is *intense*. These guys do amazing stunts on their bikes. Only one thing turned me off...one of the riders is shown in close up taking a dip of smokeless tobacco. Besides that, I highly recommend this DVD. It is entertaining and amazing to watch.
